Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.9497332] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli NCTC 8196, Escherichia coli BLR.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against E.coli but none against other Gram-negative bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria.
Sequence Information.PTM: O-linked glycan consists of a Gal-GalNAc disaccharide, O-glycosylation is essential for full biological activity.

Literature.Title: Isolation from an ant Myrmecia gulosa of two inducible O-glycosylated proline-rich antibacterial peptides.
Literature.Author: Mackintosh JA, Veal DA, Beattie AJ, Gooley AA.
